definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to shepherds or herders of other livestock .
Relating to rural life and scenes, in particular of poetry.
examples: We were living a pastoral life.

definitions.definition: Relating to the care of souls, to the pastor of a church or to any local religious leader charged with the service of individual parishioners, i.e. a priest or rabbi.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to shepherds or herders of other livestock .
secondary_definitions: Relating to rural life and scenes, in particular of poetry.
Relating to the care of souls, to the pastor of a church or to any local religious leader charged with the service of individual parishioners, i.e. a priest or rabbi.
